sentences.english: He thoroughly takes the German national charater apart in the essay.
sentences.chinese: 他在这篇文章里透彻地剖析了德意志民族性格。

sentences.english: He has a better eye for similarities among cultures than for diversities.
sentences.chinese: 他看各种文化之间的相似点比看其相异点更为透彻。

sentences.english: It insists upon one’s performing an act of lucidity as one performs an act of faith.
sentences.chinese: 它坚持要求人们行事明晰透彻，如同执着于信仰。

sentences.english: Realise this deeply, carry it in your heart when you walk the world.
sentences.chinese: 要透彻地领悟到这一点，在你窗荡世界时铭记于心。

sentences.english: A good understanding of value types is extremely important to every .
sentences.chinese: 透彻理解值类型对每个。

sentences.english: However, Qinghe could read his mind. She could only have wedding in the mind.
sentences.chinese: 然而，青河并不能理解得很透彻，她的心里只有婚礼。

sentences.english: They belonged to the Chan school of Buddhism, the basis of whose creed was abstract meditation.
sentences.chinese: 他们都属于佛教禅院，其教义的实质是透彻觉悟。

sentences.english: Eliminate skin filth, no tight feeling after using, skin and muscle limpidly delicate white.
sentences.chinese: 清除表面污垢，用后无紧绷感，肌肤透彻嫩白。

sentences.english: About his recent artworks, its more proficient and clear of his using materials.
sentences.chinese: 他的近作对材料的使用更加娴熟也更加透彻。

sentences.english: Think it through, but don't make it a burden.
sentences.chinese: 想透彻，但不要让其成为负担。

sentences.english: He drove home his point by citing specific examples.
sentences.chinese: 他举了具体的例子才把论点讲透彻。

sentences.english: His vision of Paris isn’t perceptive.
sentences.chinese: 他对巴黎的看法并不够透彻。

sentences.english: People can read us... sometimes better than we can ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 别人能看穿我们，有时甚至比我们看得还透彻。

sentences.english: KUI deserved the Thesis Prize because his thesis was very thorough and accomplished.
sentences.chinese: 由于他的论文全面透彻和高完成度而获得了论文奖。

sentences.english: His book on colour photography exhausted the subject.
sentences.chinese: 他那本关于彩色摄影术的书写得全面透彻。

sentences.english: Writing forces you to mature your ideas by thinking through counterarguments.
sentences.chinese: 通过透彻地思考辩论，写作强制你去锤炼你的思想。

definition: to understand clearly/to be clear about/plain/clear/also written 明瞭|明了[ming2 liao3]
to understand clearly/to be clear about/plain/clear
to understand thoroughly/to see beyond the facade/to see through (sb)
clear as a flame (idiom); to see things absolutely clearly
clear/distinct/to understand thoroughly/to be clear about
thorough and detailed/exhaustive/the tedious details in full
